name: The Hookmarine
description:
Remove the toxic waste from the deep ocean using your submarine and a hook.

Use your hook to move around in this physics based game, grab those awful toxic barrels and drop them into your ship and clean the ocean.

This game was made during the Ludum Dare 48.

Music for Manatees by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4102-music-for-manatees
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
